name: Points Must Be Covered By Line
description: The points in on layer must be covered by lines in another layer.
Points errors are created on the points that are not covered by lines.
For example, this rule is useful when is needed model points that are coincident with lines
like as when there are falls along a set of lines, such as highway signs along highways.

DeletePoint.name: Delete Point
description: This action delete the point errors, points that are not covered by the line must be deleted.
Delete Point action, that do not comply the rule
